conclusion: Analyze areas under v-t graphs to determine displacement.
Car A's velocity increases linearly from 0 to 40 m/s over 10 seconds, forming a right triangle.
Calculate displacement of Car A using area of triangle: 200 m.
Car B's velocity increases linearly from 0 to 20 m/s over 10 seconds, forming a right triangle.
Calculate displacement of Car B using area of triangle: 100 m.
Compare displacements: Car A (200 m) is ahead of Car B (100 m) at t = 10 seconds.
Final answer: At t = 10 seconds, Car A is ahead of Car B.
